statements: SELECT * FROM ArTechnologyMonitoring;
SELECT user_name, ar_device_id FROM ArTechnologyMonitoring WHERE misuse_detected = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, user_name, ar_session_end FROM ArTechnologyMonitoring WHERE ar_session_end IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ArTechnologyMonitoring WHERE user_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT ar_session_start, ar_session_end FROM ArTechnologyMonitoring ORDER BY ar_session_start DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM ArTechnologyMonitoring WHERE misuse_detected = TRUE;
SELECT user_name, ar_session_start, ar_session_end FROM ArTechnologyMonitoring WHERE ar_device_id = 101 ORDER BY ar_session_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM ArTechnologyMonitoring WHERE ar_session_start >= '2021-06-01' AND ar_session_end <= '2021-06-30';
SELECT user_id, user_name, ar_session_start, ar_session_end FROM ArTechnologyMonitoring WHERE ar_device_id = 201 AND misuse_detected = FALSE ORDER BY ar_session_start ASC;
SELECT user_name, CASE WHEN misuse_detected THEN 'Misuse Detected' ELSE 'No Misuse Detected' END AS misuse_status FROM ArTechnologyMonitoring WHERE ar_device_id IN (101, 202);
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date FROM ar_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ar_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT username, email FROM ar_users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_description FROM ar_activities WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_activities ORDER BY activity_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ar_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM ar_users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, registration_date FROM ar_users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ar_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT ar_activities.activity_id, ar_activities.activity_description, ar_users.username FROM ar_activities LEFT JOIN ar_users ON ar_activities.user_id = ar_users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM ar_users;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM ar_users WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT device_name, device_description FROM ar_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT log_id, activity_type, activity_time FROM ar_activity_logs WHERE activity_time > '2021-01-01';

SELECT user_name, device_name, activity_type, activity_time FROM ar_users INNER JOIN ar_devices ON ar_users.user_id = ar_devices.user_id INNER JOIN ar_activity_logs ON ar_devices.device_id = ar_activity_logs.device_id;
SELECT * FROM ar_users;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM ar_users WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT device_id, device_name, user_id FROM ar_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT log_id, activity_type, activity_time FROM ar_activity_logs WHERE activity_type = 'Login' AND activity_time > '2022-01-01';

SELECT user_name, user_email, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM ar_users LEFT JOIN ar_devices ON ar_users.user_id = ar_devices.user_id LEFT JOIN ar_activity_logs ON ar_devices.device_id = ar_activity_logs.device_id GROUP BY user_name, user_email ORDER BY log_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_users;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM ar_users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM ar_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM ar_users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT user_name, registration_date FROM ar_users JOIN ar_activities ON ar_users.user_id = ar_activities.user_id WHERE ar_activities.activity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM ar_users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM ar_devices WHERE purchase_date < '2021-06-30';
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM ar_activities WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_email, registration_date FROM ar_users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT permission_description FROM ar_permissions WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM AR_Users;
SELECT username, email FROM AR_Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sessions FROM AR_Sessions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT permission_name, permission_description FROM AR_Permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT username, email, last_login FROM AR_Users WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM AR_Users ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM AR_Users WHERE user_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT * FROM AR_Sessions WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' AND end_time < '2022-02-01'
SELECT username, email, last_login FROM AR_Users JOIN AR_Permission_Assignments ON AR_Users.user_id = AR_Permission_Assignments.user_id

SELECT AR_Users.username, AR_Sessions.start_time, AR_Actions.action_description FROM AR_Users JOIN AR_Sessions ON AR_Users.user_id = AR_Sessions.user_id JOIN AR_Actions ON AR_Sessions.session_id = AR_Actions.session_id
